description:
Implement prominent, real-time visual warnings when users enter symptoms matching emergency indicators (chest pain, syncope, altered consciousness, etc.). Include recommended immediate actions and escalation protocols.

**Rationale:** Critical symptoms may be buried in checkbox forms without immediate recognition. Real-time alerts ensure emergency conditions trigger appropriate urgent response protocols, improving patient safety.
title: Red flag visual alerts during examination data entry
